verses.roman:
ghare giyā miśra kaila snāna, bhojana
sandhyā-kāle dekhite āila prabhura caraṇa

synonyms: ghare giyā—returning home; miśra—Pradyumna Miśra; kaila—performed; snāna—bathing; bhojana—eating; sandhyā-kāle—in the evening; dekhite—to see; āila—came; prabhura caraṇa—the lotus feet of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
translation: After returning home, Pradyumna Miśra bathed and ate his meal. In the evening he came to see the lotus feet of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
